Entries.default: <ispeech>Llengrath recognizes your song. Is this garden to your liking? Does every blossoming pustule swell your eggs with anticipation?</ispeech> The spore colony twitches and shivers as you draw near.

<ispeech>Your song is too beautiful to allow any obstruction to impede its growth. Allow us to fertilize a bed of gratitude.</ispeech> 

Wael's flesh twitches and spasms as thick tendrils of fungus reach out to clear a path.
"Looks like you've managed to spread yourself pretty far."
"You might need a refresher lesson on kith biology. None of that is true."
"Out of my way. This is no time for mushroom talk."

<ispeech>Gratitudes. For now the flesh-garden is a still pond. A small stone casts a broad ripple.</ispeech> A pinkish hue spreads across the cap of a mushroom, almost like it's practicing how to blush.
<ispeech>One thousand apology glands. We are mottled with delight over this garden, but hear in your song a desire to probe deeper.</ispeech>
